pullRequest.title: [DOCS] Remove Outdated Snapshot Docs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Removing some now outdated statements that refer to a time
when snapshot operations could not run concurrently.
Closes #61680
Backports:

7.x #61728
7.9 #61733

commit.message:
Remove Outdated Snapshot Docs

Removing some now outdated statements that refer to a time
when snapshot operations could not run concurrently.

Closes #61680

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            If a currently running snapshot was started by mistake, or takes unusually long, it can be stopped using the <<delete-snapshot-api,delete snapshot API>>.
          
          
            
            To stop a currently running snapshot that was started by mistake or is taking unusually long, use
          
          
            
            the <<delete-snapshot-api,delete snapshot API>>.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -149,8 +149,7 @@ detailed insight into the current state of the recovery process by using <<indic
 [discrete]
 [[get-snapshot-stop-snapshot]]
 === Stop snapshot and restore operations
-The snapshot and restore framework allows running only one snapshot or one restore operation at a time. If a currently
-running snapshot was started by mistake, or takes unusually long, it can be stopped using the <<delete-snapshot-api,delete snapshot API>>.
+If a currently running snapshot was started by mistake, or takes unusually long, it can be stopped using the <<delete-snapshot-api,delete snapshot API>>.

nodes.bodyText: Suggest reordering this sentence to make it more focused on the action. I realize that I missed that change in the previous PR 😆

-running snapshot was started by mistake, or takes unusually long, it can be stopped using the <<delete-snapshot-api,delete snapshot API>>.
+If a currently running snapshot was started by mistake, or takes unusually long, it can be stopped using the <<delete-snapshot-api,delete snapshot API>>.
